ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_measvxrge0 | |- ( ( M e. ( measures ` S ) /\ A e. S ) -> ( M ` A ) e. ( 0 [,] +oo ) ) |
| 2 |  | #P_elxrge0 | |- ( ( M ` A ) e. ( 0 [,] +oo ) <-> ( ( M ` A ) e. RR* /\ 0 <_ ( M ` A ) ) ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_sylib | |- ( ( M e. ( measures ` S ) /\ A e. S ) -> ( ( M ` A ) e. RR* /\ 0 <_ ( M ` A ) ) ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_simprd | |- ( ( M e. ( measures ` S ) /\ A e. S ) -> 0 <_ ( M ` A ) ) |
